mapper.select:
select
from CM_Company cc left join CM_Matcher cm on cc.coid = cm.coid
cc.CPID = #{cpid}
and cc.CO_Name like '%${keyword}%'
and cm.AR_Code = #{arCode}
and cm.AR_Name like '%${arName}%'
ORDER BY cm.CR_Style
